sentences.english: Adding additives in calcium-based sorbents could improve the sulfur capture capacity.
sentences.chinese: 这可以通过添加助剂等来提高固硫率。

sentences.english: Nickel naphthenate is used broadly in petrochemical and chemical scopes.
sentences.chinese: 环烷酸镍是石油化工领域内的重要助剂。

sentences.english: Why do some pandemic influenza vaccines contain adjuvants and others don't?
sentences.chinese: 为什么甲流疫苗有辅助剂而其他疫苗没有？

sentences.english: This infor-marion will be of great value to us for developing our new hot-melt adhesiveassistants.
sentences.chinese: 这对开发我国新型热熔胶助剂是很有参考价值的。

sentences.english: Enhancer and other additives for paper making.
sentences.chinese: 造纸用增强剂及其它助剂。

sentences.english: The ink additional solution influences on matching of inks significantly.
sentences.chinese: 油墨辅助剂对油墨适性调节具有很关键的影响。

sentences.english: The application of additives in waterborne automotive base coats were introduced.
sentences.chinese: 对助剂在汽车用水性底色漆中的应用作了介绍。

sentences.english: Textile auxiliaries are one field of the necessary chemicals for textile production.
sentences.chinese: 纺织印染助剂是纺织品生产必需的化学品之一。

sentences.english: This products is a two-component, additives should 3%, using within 4 hours.
sentences.chinese: 本产品为双组份，助剂用量3%，加入4小时内有效。

sentences.english: Then, the water-based road marking coating was prepared by the selected emulsion, filler and auxiliary.
sentences.chinese: 将乳液加入颜料及助剂研制出性能优良的水性道路漆。

sentences.english: Driers for coatings are the essential and auxiliary agents.
sentences.chinese: 涂料催干剂是涂料最重要的助剂。

sentences.english: Adjuvants are substances that enhance the immune response in vaccines and can make them more effective.
sentences.chinese: 辅助剂的作用是提高疫苗的免疫反应并使他们更有效。

sentences.english: Soaping and rubbing fastness are not influence on all the six agents.
sentences.chinese: 染色制品的皂洗牢度和摩擦牢度不受该类助剂的影响。

sentences.english: It helps to guide to choose functional agents for BOPP film.
sentences.chinese: 为BOPP薄膜中功能助剂的选用提供指导。

sentences.english: The said promotor had good adaptability with various cracking catalysts.
sentences.chinese: 该助剂对不同催化剂具有很好的适应性。

sentences.english: The effects of adding corresponding comminution assistant for powder material on ultramicrocomminution were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 探讨粉体物料添加相应的粉碎助剂对超微粉碎的影响。
